text: Physonomists begin to build a huge building to climb the secret archive of the soul. The reasonable soul is up and smiling, for he foresees that before this Babylonian monument reaches a quarter of its height, the languages of the masonry will be confused and left unfinished. The genius of the gods. Finished Aphorisms, 1773
title: El genio de los dioses
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg
